channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 03:48 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 03:48 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Follow for further updates. #Cherkasy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
